attributes.action: Consider using the Mental Health Act for the Sectioning of sufferers of Anorexia and similar eating disorders.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who suffer from Anorexia and similar eating disorders are causing suffering to themselves, and are thus a danger to themselves and Sectioning under the Mental Health Act for a minimum term of 6 months would help their condition to improve.
